item.description:
A mix of networking, presentation, small group discussions will launch this first meetup with me as your new organizer.

The presentation: "Social Networking Strategies for Nonprofits" will be presented by Jonah Lupton, Founder & Pres. of SocialTrak (Socialtrak.com) Jonah is also the Asst. VP and Trust officer for Cambridge Appleton Trust and has a passion for connecting people in the nonprofit sector.

Jonah will speak to the various options around social media and present strategies for using it to expand contacts and potential donors.

This is a great opportunity to connect with your colleagues, learn, share and get supported in your commitment to being a positive influence in the world!

We will be meeting at:

WorkBar Boston

a brand new coworking space just across the street from South Station. THese folks are committed to building community and being a resource for meetups. We'll be their first event! Another first!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be ariving at ~6:30... Note: WorkBar is in the Beebe Building above Les Zygomates retaurant if you want a bite before hand...
item.name: Social Media Got you Stuck?
